name: SpaceDuster
description:
This is my game. It consists of three levels and Main Menu. I integrated the following modifications:

1) Power ups - the player can collect orbs (not shoot, collect by colliding) on every level, they increase score;

2) I added different types of enemies - space stations that, black holes that can cause damage;

3) Environment - I added such elements as planets, asteroids, solar station. They move or spin.

4) UI - brave instruction is added to the menu

Credits:

created by Kateryna Kasian
